entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
